name: Born to Rise
description:
In the depths of a long-forgotten city, amidst the ruins, lies the remnants of a malevolent Archonist, whose sadistic pursuits have claimed countless lives in the relentless pursuit of perfection. Prepare to embark on an extraordinary quest as you assume the role of Yridis, immersing yourself in this subterranean realm. Unveil the purpose of your existence, reclaim your lost memories, and expose the enigmatic Archonist.

Introducing "Born To Rise," an awe-inspiring 2.5D action-adventure platformer set within a mesmerizing underworld. Journey through treacherous acidic ruins, ancient cities steeped in history, and labyrinthine dungeons that seemingly stretch on endlessly. Engage in intense battles against corrupted creatures, unwitting pawns bound to serve their creator's nefarious whims. Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative that will unravel the true significance of your odyssey, while delving deep into the enigma surrounding the identity of the Archonist.

Prepare to ascend to new heights as you unveil the secrets that lie within, confronting formidable challenges, and unearthing the ultimate truth that awaits in "Born To Rise".

  • Travel through 3 different levels: Discover new locations, enemies and hazards while the Archonist laughs at your failures. Complete each zone as fast as you can and overcome the three strenuous challenges that will determine Yridis’ future.
  • Explore: Investigate and discover every corner and secrets of The Undergrounds
  • The Three Labors: Complete each level as fast as you can and overcome the three strenuous challenges that will determine Yridis’ future.
